BLHar2339.First Lines:
These ben þe sacramentis seueneþat…demned to holi
                    chirche…
BLHar2339.Last Lines:
…ffor after trewe men schulen se his faceÞat seintis ben
                    fed wiþ briȝt & clere
BLHar2339.Attributed Title:
Þese ben þe seuene sacrmentis þat suen (rubricated, f.
                        119v)
